Content.Text: The brow was too dark and overdone, so I used a cotton swab soaked in micellar water to remove the black shadow and replaced it with a darker brown shade that better suited her features.
The yellow highlighter was in the wrong spot, so I removed it with micellar water and replaced it with a coppery shade that complemented her skin tone.
The original lipstick was too matte and pale, so I removed it with a balm and applied a sheer gloss that enhanced her natural lip color.
